QuestData.Title: The Direhorn and the Saurid
QuestData.Description:
<A gentle voice enters your mind.>
I am pleased with your efforts. He will not soon forget the kindness you have shown him, and so he will not soon forget me.
Now your journey will take you south. I can no longer sense one of my wayshrines. If you can determine what has happened to it and restore it, I would be grateful.
QuestData.LogDescription: Discover the fate of the central wayshrine.
